body:
Hey :D, currently upon logging onto Avicus, it takes up to 5 minutes on the 'downloading terrain' screen, and when I get on I get a lot of lag, to be greeted by another 'downloading terrain' screen, (Because of hub reloading). Anyone know the issue and how to fix it?

Many thanks, Lego

:D

replies.body: Probably is your PC or Internet to be honest here, as nearly no one is having this problem, nor am I, I would recommend restarting you router, restarting your computer or if you are that hardcore to switch internet provider :P
